chapter.title: Variables
chapter.para: Values can be bound to variables within a certain scope. Variable references always begin with a dollar sign.
Variables are immutables, but variable bindings can be hidden with a binding to a variable with the same name.
Variables can be declared with global variable declarations, FLWOR expressions, typeswitch expressions.
There is a special variable which is called the context item and which is denoted with a double dollar. The context item is used in predicate expressions to refer to the current item.
